comment.body:
>Why I am mentioned in this thread?

So, apparently the anonymous AdGuard-product user who used AdGuard's report form, filled their form with random nonsensical babble and images, including in the "Type your GitHub username here to get automatic updates on the report" box.

issue.title: www.packagetrackr.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.packagetrackr.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.packagetrackr.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @twopir > AdGuard isn't working at all. It reports 7 filters, 123651 rules, 20642 advanced rules, and a last update of August 3, 2022 at 1:03 AM (UTC), but every web page I visit is drenched in ads. Turning it on and off has not worked. Updating filters has not worked. Uninstalling and reinstalling has not worked. Please advise. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
>Likely due to pseudo "first-line"

You are probably right.
As far as I understand, matched `span` without `::first-line` doesn't have `text-shadow` (it has `text-shadow: none`), so that's why it doesn't work. And it seems that `::first-line` is not supported by Extended CSS rules.

issue.title: m.search.naver.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.0(954)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.search.naver.com/search.naver?sm=mtp_hty.top&where=m&query=

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, EasyList, List-KR, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Powerlinks are not blocked on m.search.naver.com and are presented with a broken layout.
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![F995C557-E434-4AAD-A562-64C67DEBEB54](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/182541235-57901093-7eff-4faf-b499-787ab741faef.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: e.mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ВНИМАНИЕ

Пользователям программы для `Windows`, `macOS` или `Android` нужно включить расширение `AdGuard Extra` в настройках программы.

---

Пользователям браузерного расширения нужно установить [расширение AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra#how-to-install-adguard-extra) либо скрипт `AdGuard Extra`(этот вариант может не везде срабатыавать). 

<details><summary>Установка скрипта  "AdGuard Extra" в расширение "Tampermonkey"  :</summary>

Для установки скрипта понадобится браузерное расширение-скриптоприёмник `Tampermonkey`

Ссылка на `AdGuard Extra`
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

После установки скрипта нужно будет зайти в настройки `Tampermonkey`, включить режим эксперта, переключить режим встраивания на `мгновенный` и перезапустить расширение:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641343-07248e00-b94c-11e9-9775-9854a7922889.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

</details>

issue.title: m.search.naver.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.0(954)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.search.naver.com/search.naver?sm=mtp_hty.top&where=m&query=

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, EasyList, List-KR, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Powerlinks are not blocked on m.search.naver.com and are presented with a broken layout.
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![F995C557-E434-4AAD-A562-64C67DEBEB54](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/103377449/182541235-57901093-7eff-4faf-b499-787ab741faef.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
